dublinCore.dc:title: 118 HR 4634 IH: To authorize appropriations for the operation of the Southwest Montana Veterans’ Home, located in Butte, Montana.
dublinCore.dc:rights: Pursuant to Title 17 Section 105 of the United States Code, this file is not subject to copyright protection and is in the public domain.

action.action-desc: Mr. Rosendale introduced the following bill; which was referred to the Committee on Veterans' Affairs

form.official-title: To authorize appropriations for the operation of the Southwest Montana Veterans’ Home, located in Butte, Montana.

section.header: Authorization of appropriations for operation of Southwest Montana Veterans’ Home, Butte, Montana; reduction of certain amounts

subsection.text: There are authorized to be appropriated $5,000,000 for fiscal year 2024 for the operation of the Southwest Montana Veterans’ Home, Butte, Montana.
The amounts available to the Secretary of Veterans Affairs to carry out the Electronic Health Modernization program of the Department of Veterans Affairs are hereby reduced by $5,000,000.
